content: प्रकीर्णक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Scattered or strewn about &c. --कः --क {@--1@} A chowrie, flyflap (चामर); <ls>Śi. 12. 17.</ls> {@--2@} A tuft of hair used as an ornament for horses. --कः A horse. --कं {@--1@} A miscellany, any collection of miscellaneous things. {@--2@} A miscellaneous chapter. {@--3@} A section, chapter or division of a book. {@--4@} A case not provided by the Śāstras and to be decided by the judge or king. {@--5@} Extent, length (of a book &c.).
